title: DeathEnding
body:
<<changeImage Death>>
In the end you decided to accept death.
<<changeImage ErrorDevice>> 
And in return every devices have slowly glitch out.
even those who were immortal.
<< changeImage BurningCity>> 
Panic and chaos ensure as everyone cannot tell when they will die.
In the end death return to the mortal and immortal plane.
The End
Ending: Death returns.

title: FakeImmortality
body:
A few client later.
The secret police arrived and questions you.
<<changeImage ArrestBadge>> 
"Have you seen this guy"
You seen his face from the request form. But you decided to stay quiet.
"We know you had a deal with him"
The police is aware and immediately took your device.
"That what I tough, Your hear by under arrest for purchasing and holding illegal life extension device"
The police handcuff you and put you in prison.
<<changeImage TrialCourt>> 
Days later the trials begin. You pleaded not Guilty.
But that doest matter as you were found Guilty.
And sentence to death.
The end
Ending: False Immortality

title: TimeUpEnding
body:
So many bad client, so little time.
You ran out of time. You fainted on the spot.
As the medic team arrived. You were declared dead.
The end
Ending: Time has ran out.

title: Immortal
body:
Congratulation, Your prove yourself worth of becoming immortal.
Your device deactivated as you no longer needed one.
you were sent to the upper Escalon of the land of the immortal.
Leaving the lower immortal world.
But.. Something is a missed.
This isn't right this isn't what you were hoped for.
The whole thing was a lie. You were never supposed to be with them.
Now you were just some clown performing entertainment to the true immortals.
For the rest of your life.
The end
Ending: "True" Immortality
